Articles.Content:
Hi! I would like to request a mod.

Yesterday i was making a Duna rover, and there was no real way to put out tracks from the bay it was in. I could bootstrap together the octagonal struts, but that would make the payload very wide.

That's why i would like to request a form of deployable tracks, that go from for an example a 90 degree angle to 25 degree angle.
You mean like a ramp?  Depending on the form factor I know of a few.
